xmlns:syn="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/syndication/" xmlns="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/">             <channel rdf:about="http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/ecn-assoc/RSS">   <title>Organisations & programmes associated with ECN</title>   <link>http://www.ecn.ac.uk</link>    <description>            Links to organisations & programmes associated with ECN        </description>                     <syn:updatePeriod>daily</syn:updatePeriod>             <syn:updateFrequency>1</syn:updateFrequency>             <syn:updateBase>2010-09-11T14:21:18Z</syn:updateBase>             <image rdf:resource="http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/uk-national-ammonia-monitoring-network-namn"/>            </rdf:Seq>   </items>  </channel>     <item rdf:about="http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/alter-net">     <title>ALTER-Net</title>     <link>http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/alter-net</link>     <description>ALTER-Net is a European network of mainly research organisations which aims to integrate biodiversity research capacity across Europe.  ALTER-Net began as a "Network of Excellence" funded by the EU's 6th Framework Programme, and is now self-financed by its member organisations.  </description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>            <dc:subject>link-set:ecn-associated</dc:subject>          <dc:date>2011-02-01T14:25:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>Link</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/bicco-net">     <title>BICCO-Net</title>     <link>http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/bicco-net</link>     <description>BICCO-Net is a collaborative project providing the latest information on the impacts of Climate Change on UK biodiversity. ECN has provided data and expertise</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>            <dc:subject>climate change</dc:subject>                 <dc:subject>biodiversity</dc:subject>                 <dc:subject>link-set:ecn-associated</dc:subject>          <dc:date>2014-07-28T09:36:52Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>Link</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/countryside-survey">     <title>Countryside Survey</title>     <link>http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/countryside-survey</link>     <description>Countryside Survey is a unique study or \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdaudit\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd of the natural resources of the UK\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds countryside.  It has been carried out at regular intervals since 1978, allowing scientists to detect the gradual and subtle changes that occur in the UK\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds countryside over time.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>            <dc:subject>link-set:ecn-associated</dc:subject>          <dc:date>2011-02-01T14:30:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>Link</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/ecns-research-partners">     <title>ECN's research partners</title>     <link>http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/ecns-research-partners</link>     <description>ECN monitoring is supported by a range of research partners</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>            <dc:subject>link-set:ecn-associated</dc:subject>          <dc:date>2011-02-01T15:05:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>Link</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/ecn-sponsors">     <title>ECN's sponsors</title>     <link>http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/ecn-sponsors</link>     <description>ECN monitoring is carried out by a range of sponsoring organisations.  Each provides one or more sites and covers the costs of ECN measurements at those sites.  </description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>            <dc:subject>link-set:ecn-associated</dc:subject>          <dc:date>2011-02-01T15:05:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>Link</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/indicators-of-climate-change-in-the-uk">     <title>Indicators of Climate Change in the UK</title>     <link>http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/indicators-of-climate-change-in-the-uk</link>     <description>A report to identify a set of indicators which could be used to monitor how the climate of the United Kingdom is changing and how it may be affecting aspects of our lives and natural environment.  ECN are able to provide data for many of these variables.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>            <dc:subject>link-set:ecn-associated</dc:subject>          <dc:date>2011-02-01T14:30:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>Link</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/international-long-term-ecological-research-networks-ilter">     <title>International Long-term Ecological Research Networks (ILTER)</title>     <link>http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/international-long-term-ecological-research-networks-ilter</link>     <description>ILTER is a 'network of networks', a global network of research sites located in a wide array of ecosystems worldwide that can help understand environmental change across the globe. ILTER's focus is on long-term, site-based research.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>            <dc:subject>link-set:ecn-associated</dc:subject>          <dc:date>2011-02-01T14:35:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>Link</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/long-term-ecosystem-research-europe-lter-europe">     <title>Long-term Ecosystem Research - Europe (LTER-Europe)</title>     <link>http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/long-term-ecosystem-research-europe-lter-europe</link>     <description>LTER-Europe is the European regional network of ILTER.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>            <dc:subject>link-set:ecn-associated</dc:subject>          <dc:date>2011-02-01T14:40:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>Link</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/nerc-soil-biodiversity-thematic-programme">     <title>NERC 'soil biodiversity' thematic programme</title>     <link>http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/nerc-soil-biodiversity-thematic-programme</link>     <description>The NERC programme 'Biological Diversity and Ecosystem Function in Soil' was an integrated programme of research on the biological diversity of soil biota and the functional roles played by soil organisms in key ecological processes. It ran from 1997-2004 and was based at Sourhope in Southern Scotland, an ECN site.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>            <dc:subject>link-set:ecn-associated</dc:subject>          <dc:date>2011-02-01T14:50:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>Link</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/uk-butterfly-monitoring-scheme">     <title>UK Butterfly Monitoring Scheme</title>     <link>http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/uk-butterfly-monitoring-scheme</link>     <description>The Butterfly Monitoring Scheme (BMS) was set up in 1976 to provide information on changes in the abundance of butterflies at selected monitored sites throughout the United Kingdom.  The BMS has now merged with Butterfly Conservation's co-ordination of 'independent' transects.  The resulting UKBMS dataset is an important resource for understanding changes in insect populations.  The ECN terrestrial sites form part of the BMS.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>            <dc:subject>link-set:ecn-associated</dc:subject>          <dc:date>2011-02-01T14:50:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>Link</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/uk-national-ammonia-monitoring-network-namn">     <title>UK National Ammonia Monitoring Network (NAMN)</title>     <link>http://www.ecn.ac.uk/links/link-items/uk-national-ammonia-monitoring-network-namn</link>     <description>This network is engaged in monitoring both gaseous ammonia (NH3) and a number of air pollutants with which it reacts.  The ECN terrestrial sites form part of this network.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>            <dc:subject>link-set:ecn-associated</dc:subject>          <dc:date>2011-02-01T14:50:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>Link</dc:type>   </item>      </rdf:RDF>
